title: generate-pdf-from-markdown
description: Test the API endpoint that accepts markdown input and generates a correctly formatted PDF file. Verify the PDF content matches the markdown and the file is downloadable.

title: stream-ai-summary-generation
description: Test the streaming API endpoint for AI summary generation to ensure it streams the summary content progressively without interruption or errors.

title: fetch-and-manage-user-reports
description: Test the user reports API endpoint to verify it correctly fetches, updates, and manages user report data stored in the Supabase database.

title: generate-report-from-youtube-url
description: Test the server action that extracts transcripts from a YouTube URL, generates an AI summary, converts it to a PDF, and returns the PDF in Base64 format. Verify the entire flow works correctly and the output is valid.
